title: The Best Homemade Ranch Salad Dressing
directions: Whisk together the mayo, sour cream and milk until smooth. Add the spices and whisk until combined. Add the lemon and whisk again. Pour into a jar and chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve. This dressing will keep nicely in the refrigerator for up to a week. Enjoy!
ingredients: freshly squeezed lemon juice to taste approximately 1-3 teaspoons, adjust to taste
